scripts.convert_case: [[ -d board/output/cases ]] && for i in board/output/cases/*.jscad; do npx @jscad/cli "$i" -of stlb; done || true
scripts.case: npm run ergogen && npm run convert_case
scripts.dev: npm run ergogen && { pkill -f 'pcbnew.*sessile.kicad_pcb' || true; rm -rf board/output/pcbs/~sessile.kicad_pcb.lck 2>/dev/null || true; /Applications/KiCad/KiCad.app/Contents/Applications/pcbnew.app/Contents/MacOS/pcbnew board/output/pcbs/sessile.kicad_pcb & } && fswatch board/config.yaml board/footprints/ | while read; do npm run ergogen && { pkill -f 'pcbnew.*sessile.kicad_pcb' || true; rm -rf board/output/pcbs/~sessile.kicad_pcb.lck 2>/dev/null || true; /Applications/KiCad/KiCad.app/Contents/Applications/pcbnew.app/Contents/MacOS/pcbnew board/output/pcbs/sessile.kicad_pcb & }; done
scripts.buildrmkclean: cd rmk && cargo clean && cargo make uf2 --release
scripts.flashbootloader: sudo openocd -f interface/cmsis-dap.cfg -f target/nrf52.cfg -c init -c "reset init" -c halt -c "nrf5 mass_erase" -c "program rmk/Seeed_XIAO_nRF52840_Sense_bootloader-0.6.1_s140_7.3.0.hex verify" -c reset -c exit
